body.description: Please note that this is the 6x9 travel-sized version. If you typically require more writing space, the 8x10 version is available. You can view examples of interior pages and the versions on@we.are.storyfolk. Fall in love with novel planning! I've designed this 250-page Fantasy Novel Planner to not only assist and inspire writers in completing their manuscript but also to gently guide them through the entire novel development process, from brainstorming their first line to releasing their book into the wild.This planner is brimming with prompts, questions, worksheets, checklists, outlines, and valuable tips. It functions as a workbook, allowing you to fill its pages with your creative ideas. By the end of your journey with it, you'll have constructed a sturdy foundation to build upon during the drafting phase.Here's what's included:Fundamentals: Title, Logline, Ideal Reader Profile, and MoreDry Plotting: Loose Plot Structure, 3 Acts, Romance Plot,Protagonist's Character ArcCharacter Profiles: Profiles and Prompts for 6 Primary Characters & 8 Side Characters (Includes prompts for exploring the the romance side)Villain Profiles: Profiles for 3 VillainsMagic System: Limitations, Types, and MoreWorld Building: Map, Significant Locations, Rules, and MoreChapter Outlines: Space for up to 48 chapters (1 page each), Romance Buildup, Story TimelineDrafting: Tips to Fuel Creativity, Word-Count Goal Tracker, First Line InspirationEditing: Identifying Commonly Overused Words and a Checklist for Copy and Structural Editing, Staying Current with Story TrendsBeta Testing: Tips and ManagementBonus Sections: Query Checklist, Query Tracker, and Release PreparationNotesAnd Much More!Whether you prefer a meticulously plotted journey or the spontaneous exploration of your narrative, this planner is designed to empower your creativity and guide you towards your writing goals. Happy writing! Read more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Fantasy Romance Planner Romanced Me
reviews.reviewText: More than a planner - it’s a blueprint. I am SO excited about this purchase. It’s detailed, laid out in an easy-to-use manner, and I’m always a sucker for a velvety matte finish. This book has it all. From a cover design/color that speaks to the genre all the way to thought-provoking questions. From character profile pages (and I freaking adore the villain badness scale) all the way to useful gold nuggets like character traits and helpful websites. From a section on magic all the way to information on world building. Plus, there are plenty of pages for notes. Did I mention it’ll fit in my purse, so it’ll be handy at all times? That’s a huge win in my book - pun intended. I highly recommend with five shiny stars.Oh, and hey. NaNoWriMo, I’m coming for you!
